snippet: Yahoo has decided to retain its Alibaba stake and will instead look at transferring its other assets, including Yahoo Japan, into a new company.
abstract: Yahoo cancels tax-free spinoff of its $32 billion stake in Chinese e-commerce company Alibaba, and will proceed with spinoff of its core Internet business instead; judged possible challenge with Internal Revenue Service over $10 billion tax bill too risky.

byline.contributor: Michael J. de la Merced contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Yahoo has decided to retain its Alibaba stake and will instead look at transferring its other assets, including Yahoo Japan, into a new company.

headline.main: Yahoo to Keep Alibaba Stake but Spin Off Core Businesses
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Balks at Battle With Taxman by Spinning Off Core Business
